title: Flow-IPC Improves Inter-Process Communication for C++ Devs
author: Yuri Goldfeld
description: Flow-IPC addresses the challenge of transferring large data volumes, allowing programs to simultaneously execute threads in different processor cores.
cntitle: Flow-IPC 提升 C++ 开发人员的进程间通信
cndescription: Flow-IPC 解决了传输大量数据量的挑战，允许程序在不同的处理器核心上同时执行线程。
